src:
Gempa M 5 Terjadi di Maluku, Tak Berpotensi Tsunami
04 Nov 2019, 23:39 by Indra Komara
Jakarta - Gempa bermagnitudo 5 terjadi di Maluku. Pusat gempa disebutkan berada di 52 km barat laut Seram Bagian Barat, Maluku.
BMKG melalui situs resminya menginformasikan, gempa terjadi pada pukul 23.25 WIB, Senin (4/11/2019). Kedalaman gempa 10 km.
"Tidak berpotensi tsunami," tulis BMKG.
Titik koordinat gempa tercatat di 2,87 Lintang Selatan dan 127,76 Bujur Timur. Belum ada informasi terkait kerusakan dan ada-tidaknya korban akibat gempa.
BMKG mengimbau masyarakat mewaspadai gempa susulan.
"Hati-hati terhadap gempa bumi susulan yang mungkin terjadi," tulis BMKG.




(idn/gbr)
text:
M-5 Earthquake Occurs in Maluku, Not Potential for Tsunamis
Nov 04 2019, 23:39 by Indra Komara
Jakarta - An earthquake of magnitude 5 occurred in Maluku. The epicenter was said to be 52 km northwest of West Seram, Maluku.
BMKG via its official website informed, the earthquake occurred at 23:25 WIB, Monday (11/04/2019). The depth of the earthquake is 10 km.
"There is no potential for a tsunami," BMKG wrote.
The coordinates of the earthquake were recorded at 2.87 South Latitude and 127.76 East Longitude. There is no information related to damage and the presence or absence of victims due to the earthquake.
BMKG urges people to be aware of aftershocks.
"Be careful of possible aftershocks," BMKG wrote.




(idn / pic)
